name: Usurper's Bane
description: Viking Jarl Tora Stormvigg is betrayed and chased out of her own land. As she is forced to flee she solemnly swears to take back what is rightfully hers. - Command Tora and her small team of fierce warriors in this turn-based strategy game, fighting against the odds to achieve her ultimate goal, to become the Usurper's Bane.
